price: Tugaheza Tugasibanganya n'imitima yabo igacika agatimatare biturutse ku bugaba bwabo, ntibaheze ngo banyurwe na Qor’ani, Tukaziba n’amatwi yabo maze ntibumvirize Qor’ani ngo igire ico ibunguye; n’iyo uyaze Imana yawe Rurema muri Qor’ani, urarikira ko Yosengwa ari Imwe Rudende Itabangikanywa, baca birabira hirya bakagenza umugongo bahunga iryo rarikwa ryo gusenga batabangikanya Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفۡقَهُوهُ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَقۡرٗاۚ وَإِذَا ذَكَرۡتَ رَبَّكَ فِي ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَحۡدَهُۥ وَلَّوۡاْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِمۡ نُفُورٗا

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā ʿalā qulūbihim akinnatan an yafqahūhu wafī ādhānihim waqran wa-idhā dhakarta rabbaka fī al-qur'āni waḥdahu wallaw ʿalā adbārihim nufūran
